repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.abstract: This collection consists of correspondence, agendas, policy papers, weekly reports, minutes, Pay board proceedings, and activity reports for the Economic Stabilization Program.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: U.S. Economic Stabilization Program Records #5464. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

controlaccess.corpname: United States. Office of Economic Stabilization.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Amendments to federal regulations concerning the pay board (June & July 1972)

did.unittitle: Correspondence - (News releases, telegrams, letters, newspaper clippings)
Agendas and Policy Papers - Agendas, policy papers on agendas. (Jan. 1972 - Aug. 1972) Also tentative agendas.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: includes minutes, summary of case inventories, regulations, compliance matters, interpretations, press releases, and IRS or COLC weekly report.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: draft minutes of board meetings and index to minutes (June - Aug. 1972)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: includes summaries of activities, minutes, cases and Appeals Panel Summaries, List of cases, Congressional Activities, Press Releases, News coverage highlights, speaker's list, and regulations (May - July 1972).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Minutes of Pay Board cases and Appeals panel (March - April 1972)

did.unittitle: Cases Potentially Challengeable by Pay Board

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: including State of Ohio Civil Service Employees Feb. 24, 1972; East and Gulf Coast Longshore (both summary and application to Pay Board). May 2, 1972; New York Firefighters, June 27, 1972; Aerospace Cases, Nov.-Dec. 1971

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: includes booklets received; "Portrait of the Pay Board", "Meany on Controls," Economics of Wage and Price Controls by J.E. Pohlman; and "Pay Board Specialists' Manual."
